name: Married Woman Cosplay Life
description:
◆Caution◆
All text in the game is translated by machine translation

◆Story◆
Masataka and his wife, Misuzu, are a married couple who get along well.
Masataka, who loves cosplay, wants to have sex with Misuzu wearing various clothes, but he is reluctant to tell her.
One day, Masataka proposes to have sex with Misuzu in cosplay using a suggestion device given to him by a colleague at work.
Misuzu is skeptical, but she agrees to help her beloved husband overcome his weakness for sex...


◆Character◆

Name: Misuzu Kagohara
Height: 164cm
Three sizes：B124/W61/H93
Characteristics：Gentle, serious, natural

※Japanese voice recording
※Male characters are not recorded



◆Game Specifications◆
・Novel game that can be read by clicking.
・Heroine full voice
・CG mode
・CG mode ・Scene recollection


◆Content Warning◆
This game contains content not suitable for all ages and
may not be suitable for display in the workplace.

The game contains nudity or sexual content and general adult content.
